description.value:
You can divide your attention three ways when hunting. When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{Hunt Prey}, you can designate three creatures as prey, designate two creatures as prey and share the effect with one ally (as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Aqhsx5duEpBgaPB0]{Shared Prey}), or designate one creature as prey and share the effect with two allies.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.uXCU8GgriUjuj5FV]{Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.ltIvO9ZQlmqGD89Y]{Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.mNk0KxsZMFnDjUA0]{Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision}
